column4: so what's the preferred method of transcoding video between free formats nowadays
but i only know 1 free format
so, not much transcoding to do
mjpeg, theora, mpeg1...
hm.. didn't realize  mjpeg and mpeg1 are free
i believe they are... anyway, mng definitely is
but... mng for video?
yeah, not ideal, but it works... same as mjpeg, and i have here a few mjpeg movies
i see now mng does jpeg as well
but what do you want the movies for?
got a vid in one free format (quicktime/mjpeg), want to transcode to a more compressed free format (mpeg1 or theora)
you discard h.264 ?
while not free, it is at least open
and i don't think the quality/bitrate can be beaten
quicktime/mjpeg?
what?
you don't think what quality/bitrate can be beaten?
the quality per bitrate of h.264
well, i suppose that's all a bit subjective, but to me, it looks really good
oh, right... but there's the patent problem
yes, so, it depends on what you want to use it for
